::Kup::
   
  Kup: So no memory of what happened next and hot it lead you here. Interesting. So in your time Cybertron is more of a wasteland then it was during the second Great War and the Bots and Cons are dominate again. Tell me more about this Stormbringer, lad.

khamkain <kham31@...> wrote:
          Remus: I came from Cybertron but nothing like you could imagine. If I
am correct, I am from 3 to 5 thousand year in the future of your
cybertron, were you came from. There was a terrible destruction
brougth to cybertron the autobots and decepticon disperced torught the
universe and cybertron was left alone. Only a small numbers of
autobots was watching from space our homeland but ther was nothing.
That was until the arrival of the Stormbringer who has brought even
more chaos and destruction. We fought, but nothing seem to work. I was
created soon after it's first figth to find a way to defeated him,
without succes. So I heard about a Matrix who posseded great power and
had been held by the Legendary Optimus Prime I was searching for it in
my time when .... By the Matrix! it's like the figth with this
Cyclonus and Hot Rode nothing came back ....

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Kup::
> 
> Kup: Where did you come from? A devestated Earth or Cybertron?
> 
> OOC: You need to start sending all posts to nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
so everyone can view them.
> 
> khamkain <khamkain@...> wrote:
> Remus: This is incredebile! From where I came from the devastation is
> too huge to made something like this possible... and I cannot remember
> how did I ended up here and why. So for now I think I'll stay with you
> guy's and give a hand.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen wrote:
> >
> > ::Kup::
> >
> > Kup: Oh, going back is easy. The transwarp rift is stable. Traffic
> > and come and go through as necissary.
>
